Articles.Content:
Is it possible for KSP to consider my future nodes of ship A, when doing a randezvous maneuver by Ship B ? The problem is that at the moment when it's time for Ship's B maneuver, Ship A got 2 maneuver nodes coming in e.g. 20 and 40 minutes... So is there any way for KSP to take Ship A maneuver into account during calculation of randezvous point ?

Edited October 2, 2015 by Stigy
No. The maneuver node doesn't guarantee the crafts position anyway.
